pkg_title_cmd_override: hsp3root to override settings of other extensions
pkg_desc: VS Code extension to automatically set hsp3root
pkg_desc_cfg_globs: Fill in the [node-glob](https://www_npmjs_com/package/glob) pattern indicating the directory where the HSP3 development environment is installed.
pkg_desc_cfg_agent_autoChoice_enable: If hsp3root is not selected at startup, the HSP3_ROOT environment variable is applied.
pkg_desc_cfg_agent_autoChoice_popInfo: If hsp3root is not selected at startup, the system automatically notifies the user that the HSP3_ROOT environment variable has been applied.
pkg_desc_cfg_override_enable: Enable the ability to overwrite extended settings with the current hsp3root.
pkg_desc_cfg_override_applyChangesImmedi: Immediately after switching hsp3root, the settings of other extensions are overridden.
Once you have overridden the settings, reload the window.(run command 'workbench_action_reloadWindow')
pkg_desc_cfg_override_list: List of configuration IDs to be overridden by hsp3root.
pkg_desc_cfg_override_listEx: Advanced configuration list to be overridden by hsp3root.
pkg_desc_cfg_override_objects: Object type to be override by hsp3root.
pkg_desc_cfg_override_ignores: A list of configuration IDs to ignore overridden.
pkg_desc_cfg_override_showPopInfo: Notify you when the window needs to be reloaded.
pkg_desc_cfg_env_enable: Overwrite the HSP3_ROOT variable in the terminal with hsp3root. (If changed while the terminal is running, the change will not take effect until the terminal is restarted.)
pkg_desc_cfg_override_scope: Sets the scope to be used when overriding the "toolset-hsp3_override_list" setting.
pkg_desc_cfg_override_scope_WorkspaceFol: directory ".vscode/settings.json" or in the workspace settings.
pkg_desc_cfg_env_HSP3ROOT_enable: Insert the directory path of hsp3root into the HSP3_ROOT environment variable in the terminal.
pkg_desc_cfg_env_HSP3ROOT_single: Set HSP3_ROOT environment variables to only those selected by toolset-hsp3.
pkg_desc_cfg_env_HSP3ROOT_priority: Sets the insertion location of the hsp3root directory path for the HSP3_ROOT environment variable.
pkg_desc_cfg_env_HSP3ROOT_priority_top: Insert the directory path at the beginning.
pkg_desc_cfg_env_HSP3ROOT_priority_secon: Insert the second of the directory path.
pkg_desc_cfg_env_HSP3ROOT_priority_botto: Insert the directory path at the end.
pkg_desc_cfg_env_PATH_enable: Insert hsp3root's directory path into your terminal's PATH environment variable.
pkg_desc_cfg_env_PATH_priority: Sets the insertion position of the hsp3root directory path.
pkg_desc_cfg_env_PATH_priority_top: Insert the directory path at the beginning.
pkg_desc_cfg_env_PATH_priority_bottom: Insert the directory path at the end.
pkg_desc_cfg_log_autoPop: When the log is updated, the notification bar notifies you.
pkg_desc_cfg_log_infoLimit: Set the log level to be notified.
pkg_desc_cfg_log_infoLimit_warn: Notify with a warning or error level.
